text: Me tuavimɨn ghua, dɨpar mam bato. Egha Itiopian gumazim kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Nɨ gan, dɨpam kara. Kɨ datɨrɨghɨra ruasa, bizir tizitam ua nan suigham?”8:36-37 Fofozir gumazir maba kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, akar otevir igharazir mam uaghan kagh iti. Filip kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Nɨ guizbangɨra uan navimɨn aven nɨghnɨzir gavgavim ikɨtɨ, kɨ nɨ ruam.” Ezɨ Itiopian gumazim kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Krais Iesusɨn iti, a Godɨn Otarim.”
